A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A great film\, that only sufffers a bit from the way that humor is pushed on the audience. There is also a particular scene in the film that shows a lack of understanding of an integral concept created by Lucas. This film uses misdirection to toy with the expectations of longtime fans\, which will get mixed reviews for sure\, but in the era of Game of Thrones\, that felt fun and gave an element of surprise to this film. All in all\, a much better movie that its predecessor which is a tired rewrite of a New Hope with a female lead.
